articles.title: Mega Millions Jackpot Surges to $714 Million - Mega Millions
articles.description: Mega Millions is one of America's two big jackpot games, and the only one with Match 5 prizes up to $5 million (with the optional Megaplier).
articles.content:
Mega Millions Jackpot Surges to $714 Million
 RELEASE DATE: 10/25/2025The Mega Millions® jackpot surges past $700 million for only the ninth time in the game’s history for the next drawing on Tuesda… [+4560 chars]
